mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into Go_Order_Detail(orderid,server,servername,servertype,cpu,memory,disk,flow,ipNum,configuration,price,hostname,ns1prefix,ns2prefix,rootpw) values(#{orderid},#{server},#{servername},#{servertype} ,#{cpu},#{memory},#{disk},#{flow},#{ipNum},#{configuration},#{price},#{hostname},#{ns1prefix},#{ns2prefix},#{rootpw})
mapper.update: update Go_Order_Detail set orderid = #{orderid}, server = #{server}, servername = #{servername}, servertype = #{servertype}, cpu = #{cpu}, memory = #{memory}, disk = #{disk}, flow = #{flow}, ipNum = #{ipNum}, configuration = #{configuration}, price = #{price}, hostname = #{hostname}, ns1prefix = #{ns1prefix}, ns2prefix = #{ns2prefix}, rootpw = #{rootpw} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from Go_Order_Detail limit ${pageSize} offset ${(currentPage - 1) * pageSize}
